data.eml:eml: A new species of Phylloicus Müller 1880 (Trichoptera: Calamoceratidae) from Espírito Santo State, southeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barcelos-Silva, Patrik, Desidério, Gleison Robson, Pes, Ana Maria (2017): A new species of Phylloicus Müller 1880 (Trichoptera: Calamoceratidae) from Espírito Santo State, southeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4238 (2): 287-292, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4238.2.11
